mapper.select: select * from notice_board where cate_code ='N1' order by notice_reg
mapper.insert: insert into notice_board(notice_no, notice_title, notice_content) values(notice_seq.nextval, #{notice_title}, #{notice_content})
mapper.select: select notice_no, notice_title, notice_content, notice_reg from (select rownum rn, notice_no, notice_title, notice_content, notice_reg from notice_board where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
select count(*) from notice_board where notice_no > 0
